data.description: Translates world coords. to Tk coords.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Viewport is based on Leendert Ammeraal's VIEWPORT.CPP as presented
    in his book 'Programming Principles in Computer Graphics'. I feel
    many might find it easy to use and useful for writing "wireframe"
    video games. I demonstrate how to use Viewport in the script
    LunarLander.pl.
